channel.title: [639]adding a timer/sleep/wait[639]

item.title: [639]adding a timer/sleep/wait[639]
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

so i an making a quest where you kill a necromancer and it gives u a crystal heart and says sumthing
so in the death method

switch (npcId) { case 10206: case 10205: case 10204: case 10203: killer.getPlayer().getSkills().addExperience(24, killer.getPlayer().getSkills().getLevel(24) * 11); break; case 5838: if(killer.getPlayer().getDefinition().getProquest() >= 2){ forceText("you already defeated me you dont need to kill me again");} else{ forceText("NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO HOW COULD DEFEAT ME ?!?!?!?"); killer.getPlayer().forceText("SUCK MY DICK BITCH"); killer.getPlayer().getInventory().addItem(744,1); killer.teleport(2208, 4961, 0); killer.getPlayer().getDefinition().setProquest(2); } break; }
btw Proquest is the variable which i record the stages of the quest

i added this but when i kill it the player gets teleported too quickly and you dont get to see the daeth and the messages

so can sum 1 tell me wheat should i add to make it wait like 10000 miliseconds like
player.gettimer(10000);
or sumthing like that as it would be als useful in a command where the player says bai and teleports
tbh i think its already there in the server just that im too stupid to find it i guessâ€¦

maby i have to use like the java.timer.*; package or sumthing

thanks in advanc
